abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu tells Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin of his concerns over Russia's decision to sell S-300 air-defense missile system to Iran.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu told President Vladimir V. Putin that the sale of the S-300 missile system to Iran would “encourage Iranian aggression.”

headline.main: Israeli Leader Expresses Dismay Over Russian Sale of Missiles to Iran
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Israel: Prime Minister Criticizes Russian Missile-System Sale to Iran

snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu told President Vladimir V. Putin that the sale of the S-300 missile system to Iran would “encourage Iranian aggression.”
